scope: Comprehensive visual + journey testing vs PRD/Tech Spec
summary: Landing page verified visually. Authenticated journeys could not be executed by the frontend test agent due to automated Google OAuth limitations in this environment.
passes: Landing page renders hero, stats, and sign-in CTA

blocks.impact: Prevents automated testing of Reduce/Engage modules and deep dive flows
blocks.workaround_needed: Need a non-interactive test session_id or a platform-supported test login path

gaps_vs_prd_tech_spec.spec_reference: Non-functional: explainability + trust; QA requirement for comprehensive journey validation
gaps_vs_prd_tech_spec.note: Product flows likely work, but could not be validated by automation due to OAuth constraints. Manual testing still required.

notes.known_environment_limitation: Playwright automation cannot complete Google OAuth interactively in this runner
notes.next: Run backend API tests (server-side) and obtain guidance for platform-supported auth automation
